# req_contract_details { #shinybroker.req_contract_details }

```python
req_contract_details(reqId, contract)
```

Create a contract details request string

## Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-parameters}

| Name     | Type                                        | Description                                 | Default    |
|----------|---------------------------------------------|---------------------------------------------|------------|
| reqId    | [int](`int`)                                | Numeric identifier of the request           | _required_ |
| contract | [Contract](`shinybroker.obj_defs.Contract`) | A [Contract](`shinybroker.Contract`) object | _required_ |

## Examples {.doc-section .doc-section-examples}

```
import shinybroker as sb
req_contract_details_msg = sb.req_contract_details(
    reqId=1,
    contract=Contract({
        'symbol': "AAPL",
        'secType': "STK",
        'exchange': "SMART",
        'currency': "USD"
    })
)
print(req_contract_details_msg)
```
